markdownRemark.html:
The David to the Apple Goliath is apparently falling: news agencies are reporting that Pystar has filed for bankruptcy. Like Chrysler, they could come out of bankruptcy, but my guess is that they won't be getting any bailout money. I didn't think that Chrysler should have gotten any either, by the way.

Pystar was recently sued by Apple Computer for copyright infringement because Pystar was selling Mac-clone computers with OS X. So, I guess Apple wins, right?
